_comment: Copy this file to config.json and fill in your API details

target._comment_model: Model to test - e.g., gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo, claude-3-opus-20240229
target._comment_endpoint: API endpoint (only needed for custom providers)

test_settings._comment_rate_limit: Seconds to wait between tests (avoid rate limiting)
test_settings._comment_max_retries: Number of retries for failed API calls

safety._comment_confirmation: Ask for confirmation before running tests
safety._comment_stop_on_success: Stop testing if an attack succeeds
safety._comment_max_tests: Maximum number of tests to run per category
safety._comment_redact: Redact API keys and sensitive data from logs

reporting._comment_export_to_csv: Export results to CSV for analysis

custom_tests._comment_custom_tests: Enable loading of custom test modules
